data.name: Hellway To Hell
data.detailed_description:
Hellway To Hell combines the advantages of logic games, retro stylistics and is maintained in a dark-fun atmosphere. Inherits such titles as Bomberman (stealth elements) or diablo (hack'n'slash, character development). We hope that the game will conquer the hearts of players with the offered great opportunity to manipulate the hero's characteristics. The game will steal the hearts of those who prefer to go through the game with tactics and those who want to touch the sword of each encountered monster.

Game mechanics takes into account:

- 10 lands (consisting of several levels).
- A choice of 3 character classes, each with a different skill tree.
- Leveling up.
- Randomly generated game world.
- The need to ensure that your weapons do not blunt.
- Equipment with life potions, sharpshooters or teleport to the city.
- 4 main statistics (speed, affecting the speed of attack and movement).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 or equivalent
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
